web_snippets: My name is Brooke McGlothlin, and I'm the founder of Million Praying Moms! A few things about me: I'm 47 and I LOVE being in my 40s.
Brooke McGlothlin is a trusted voice. She leads with heart, with wisdom and with the reminder of the foundational difference prayer makes.
Brooke McGlothlin is the Founder of Million Praying Moms, Host of the Everyday Prayers with Million Praying Moms podcast, and author of eight books.
